title: England vs New Zealand live stream: how to watch 2nd Test 2021 online from anywhere
author: aatif-sulleyman
summary: Fans hoping for a better show after England played safe last week
article: Last week England rejected a chase and played for the draw after the Black Caps’ rather generous declaration, deciding it was too important to not lose the first test match of the summer. But fans will be praying for the handbrake to be released at Edgbaston this week. Follow our guide as we explain how to watch an England vs New Zealand live stream and watch the 2nd Test cricket match online, wherever you are in the world.
The 1st Test was… a rather dour affair. You know it’s not been a classic when the star of the show is a fan struggling to get into a cagoule.
But there are hopes that Trent Boult will play a part this week, which would certainly liven things up. The Kiwis’ star fast bowler is once again eligible after a period of self-isolation.

Ollie Robinson was one of England’s best performers last week, but the debutant has been dropped after controversial tweets he posted when he was younger came to light. And the mood has soured further after it emerged that numerous members of the England squad have posted similarly malicious content online.

After a dispiriting week, the pressure’s on England to give fans something to cheer about. Follow our guide for all the details you need to find a reliable 2021 England vs New Zealand live stream and watch all the action from the 2nd Test cricket match online from anywhere.
